name: Rumpus
description: Hosted by the ever-charismatic Mr. Rumpus and inspired by the golden age of couch multiplayer, Rumpus is a fast-paced arcade action game for up to 4 players!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32 bits Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 @ 3.70 GHz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 6370M 1GB Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Whatever works or none if you HATE sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64 bits Processor: Intel i5-3330 CPU @ 3.00GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: A really good one
